TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowInvoker extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种调用工作流的方法，调用过程如同方法调用。

span.span: Provides a means for invoking a workflow as if it were a method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含同步调用工作流的实例方法和静态方法，以及异步调用工作流的实例方法。 contains both instance and static methods for invoking workflows synchronously, and instance methods for invoking workflows asynchronously. 不允许实例控件，如保持、卸载或恢复书签。 does not allow instance control such as persisting, unloading, or resuming bookmarks. 如果需要实例控件，请改为使用 。If instance control is desired, use instead. 若要在没有实例控件的情况下同步执行工作流，请调用 方法。To execute workflows synchronously with no instance control, call the method. 若要在没有实例控件的情况下异步执行工作流，请使用 和 方法对，或使用 方法。To execute a workflow asynchronously with no instance control, use the and method pairs, or the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 同步调用包含单个 活动的工作流。The following example synchronously invokes a workflow consisting of a single activity using . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在工作流完成时得到通知并检索该工作流的输出参数，请调用 方法的 `callback`。To be notified when the workflow is complete and retrieve the output parameters of the workflow, call from the `callback` method. 如果在工作流完成之前调用 ，此调用将会受到阻止，直至工作流完成。If is called before the workflow completes, it blocks until the workflow completes. 若要配置工作流必须在其间完成的超时间隔，请使用一种采用 的 重载。To configure a time-out interval in which the workflow must complete, use one of the overloads that take a . 此方法使用 异步设计模式以异步方式调用工作流。This method invokes a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md). ## Examples 下面的示例调用包含单个 `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活动的工作流。The following example invokes a workflow consisting of a `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity. `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活动包含两个表示掷骰子操作结果的输出参数。The `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 通过调用 可检索这些参数。These are retrieved by calling . 当对 的调用返回时，将在输出字典中返回由参数名键控的每个输出参数。When the call to returns, each output argument is returned in the outputs dictionary, keyed by argument name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在工作流完成时得到通知并检索该工作流的输出参数，请调用 方法的 `callback`。To be notified when the workflow is complete and retrieve the output parameters of the workflow, call from the `callback` method. 如果在工作流完成之前调用 ，此调用将会受到阻止，直至工作流完成。If is called before the workflow completes, it blocks until the workflow completes. 如果工作流未在指定的超时间隔内完成，那么工作流就会被中止，并且在调用 方法时会引发 。If the workflow does not complete within the specified time-out interval the workflow is aborted and a is thrown when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 仅在达到超时间隔且工作流在执行期间进入空闲状态时才会引发 。The is only thrown if the time-out interval elapses and the workflow becomes idle during execution. 如果工作流未进入空闲状态，那么完成时间超过指定超时间隔的工作流将会成功完成。A workflow that takes longer than the specified time-out interval to complete completes successfully if the workflow does not become idle. 此方法使用 异步设计模式以异步方式调用工作流。This method invokes a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md). ## Examples 下面的示例调用包含单个 `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活动的工作流。The following example invokes a workflow consisting of a `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity. `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活动包含两个表示掷骰子操作结果的输出参数。The `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 通过调用 可检索这些参数。These are retrieved by calling . 当对 的调用返回时，将在输出字典中返回由参数名键控的每个输出参数。When the call to returns, each output argument is returned in the outputs dictionary, keyed by argument name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将一直受到阻止，直到工作流已完成（包括空闲时间）。This method blocks until the workflow has completed, including idle time. 保证所有工作流执行都在调用线程上执行。All workflow execution is guaranteed to execute on the invoking thread. 如果工作流未在指定的超时间隔内完成，那么工作流就会被中止，并且会引发 。If the workflow does not complete within the specified time-out interval the workflow is aborted and a is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 仅在达到超时间隔且工作流在执行期间进入空闲状态时才会引发 。The is only thrown if the time-out interval elapses and the workflow becomes idle during execution. 如果工作流未进入空闲状态，那么完成时间超过指定超时间隔的工作流将会成功完成。A workflow that takes longer than the specified time-out interval to complete completes successfully if the workflow does not become idle. ## Examples 下面的示例调用了一个工作流，该工作流包含两个 活动和一个 活动（使用 配置为一分钟）。The following example invokes a workflow that contains two activities and a activity configured with a of one minute. 此工作流调用两次；第一次使用的超时间隔为两分钟，第二次使用的超时间隔为 30 秒。This workflow is invoked twice; the first time with a time-out interval of two minutes, and the second time with a time-out interval of 30 seconds. 第一个工作流成功完成，但第二个工作流未成功完成，而是引发 并显示下面的消息。The first workflow completes successfully, but the second one does not and a is thrown and the following message is displayed. ```Output The operation did not complete within the allotted timeout of 00:00:30. The time allotted to this operation may have been a portion of a longer timeout. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowInvokerExample#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowinvokerexample/cs/program.cs#51)] 有关使用的示例`Invoke`输出参数，请参阅的重载使用而无需在超时间隔的此重载与相同的参数。For an example of using `Invoke` with output arguments, see the overload of with the same parameters as this overload without the time-out interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将一直受到阻止，直到工作流已完成（包括空闲时间）。This method blocks until the workflow has completed, including idle time. 保证所有工作流执行都在调用线程上执行。All workflow execution is guaranteed to execute on the invoking thread. 如果工作流未在指定的超时间隔内完成，那么工作流就会被中止，并且会引发 。If the workflow does not complete within the specified time-out interval the workflow is aborted and a is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 仅在达到超时间隔且工作流在执行期间进入空闲状态时才会引发 。The is only thrown if the time-out interval elapses and the workflow becomes idle during execution. 如果工作流未进入空闲状态，那么完成时间超过指定超时间隔的工作流将会成功完成。A workflow that takes longer than the specified time-out interval to complete completes successfully if the workflow does not become idle. ## Examples 下面的示例调用了一个工作流，该工作流包含两个 活动和一个 活动（使用 配置为一分钟）。The following example invokes a workflow that contains two activities and a activity configured with a of one minute. 此工作流调用两次；第一次使用的超时间隔为两分钟，第二次使用的超时间隔为 30 秒。This workflow is invoked twice; the first time with a time-out interval of two minutes, and the second time with a time-out interval of 30 seconds. 第一个工作流成功完成，但第二个工作流未成功完成并引发 。The first workflow completes successfully, but the second one does not and a is thrown. [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowInvokerExample#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowinvokerexample/cs/program.cs#50)] 有关使用的示例`Invoke`与输入和输出参数，请参阅的重载使用而无需在超时间隔的此重载与相同的参数。For an example of using `Invoke` with input and output arguments, see the overload of with the same parameters as this overload without the time-out interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在工作流完成后得到通知，请处理 。To be notified when the workflow is complete, handle . 如果工作流未在指定的超时间隔内完成，那么工作流就会被中止，并且会引发 。If the workflow does not complete within the specified time-out interval the workflow is aborted and a is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 仅在达到超时间隔且工作流在执行期间进入空闲状态时才会引发 。The is only thrown if the time-out interval elapses and the workflow becomes idle during execution. 如果工作流未进入空闲状态，那么完成时间超过指定超时间隔的工作流将会成功完成。A workflow that takes longer than the specified time-out interval to complete completes successfully if the workflow does not become idle. 此方法使用基于事件的异步设计模式以异步方式调用工作流。This method invokes a workflow asynchronously using the event-based asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[基于事件的异步模式概述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141765)。For more information, see [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141765). ## Examples 下面的示例调用包含单个 `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活动的工作流。The following example invokes a workflow consisting of a `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity. `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活动包含两个表示掷骰子操作结果的输出参数。The `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 当工作流完成时，将在 处理程序中检索这些参数。When the workflow completes these are retrieved in the handler. span.span: Occurs when the workflow invoked by one of the overloads is completed or canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件可确定使用 重载之一调用的工作流是否成功完成，并检索完成的工作流的输出参数。Handle this to determine whether a workflow invoked with one of the overloads completed successfully and to retrieve the output arguments of the completed workflow. ## Examples 下面的示例调用包含单个 `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活动的工作流。The following example invokes a workflow consisting of a `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity. `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活动包含两个表示掷骰子操作结果的输出参数。The `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 当工作流完成时，将在 处理程序中检索这些参数。When the workflow completes these are retrieved in the handler.
